Package com.chattica.connector.sdk.standard.event.caller

Class StandardEventCaller<T extends Event>

java.lang.Object
com.chattica.connector.sdk.standard.event.caller.StandardEventCaller<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventCaller<T>, ListenerAdder<T>, ListenerContainer<T>, ListenerRemover<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChannelAddEventCaller, ChannelRemoveEventCaller, ChannelUpdateEventCaller, MessageAddEventCaller, MessageRemoveEventCaller, MessageUpdateEventCaller
public class StandardEventCaller<T extends Event> extends Object implements EventCaller<T>, ListenerContainer<T>
이벤트의 호출(call)과 이에대한 처리(listen)를 관리하는 EventCaller 의 ListenerContainer 를 사용한 표준구현체입니다.
Since:
0.0.1alpha-RELEASE
